channel.title: Stark
channel.description: Easily check your designs against the 8 different types of colorblindness. In addition, run a pair of colors against WCAG 2.0 standards.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description: • Added info on the different types of colorblindness.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
• Add hotkeys for zooming in and out, cycling through the different colorblind options, and cycling through the artobards in the document.
  • Fixed the treshold for each of the WCAG 2.0 contrast standards.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
• Zoom in and zoom out buttons when viewing an artboard.
  • Problem with contrast checker not working if you closed and reopened the window.
